name: Swaggy Trump
description:
How high can Trump jump? In this addictive one-touch vertical jumping game, the aim is to jump as high as possible without being killed by the dangerous obstacles in your way!

Keep tapping to bounce as you help trump jump as high as he can. With dangerous traps, devices and obstacles in your way such as ninja stars, samurai swords, spears and more, there are plenty of things that can kill you as you take trump on a bouncy adventure!

----------------------------
SWAGGY TRUMP – HIGHLIGHTS
----------------------------
- Endless vertical jumping fun!
- Simple one-touch controls
- The higher you jump, the more coins you earn
- Spend your coins & unlock hilarious new characters
- Time your jumps to avoid the deadly, randomly generated obstacles
- Play offline – no internet connection required!

Whether you’re commuting to work, on a road trip or you’re bored and have time to kill, you’ll love Swaggy Trump! With simple, one touch controls and hilariously addictive gameplay, this is one game you won’t be able to put down!
